channel.title: Franky on Portrait of Pirates - The final guide of figures
channel.description: Recent content in Franky on Portrait of Pirates - The final guide of figures

item.description: Name: Franky P.O.P Neo Character: Franky Category: Neo Sculptor: Black Sabbath Official price: 4725 ¥ Preorder date: Jul-07 Release date: Oct-07 Reeditions: Jun-09 Height: 23 (cm) Weight: 810 (g) Box size: 28.0 x 26.0 x 16.0 (cm)

Name: Franky P.O.P CB3 Character: Franky Category: CB Sculptor: MDM Official price: 1890 ¥ Preorder date: Oct-08 Release date: Jan-09 Reeditions: Dec-10 Height: 12.5 (cm) Weight: 150 (g) Box size: 16.0 x 13.0 x 7.0 (cm) Bonus: Don Quixote lanzó reedición de esta figura. Preordenable en noviembre de 2010 a 1780¥, se sortearon el 17 de Diciembre de 2010 de forma exclusiva en estas tiendas.

Name: Franky P.O.P Strong Edition Character: Franky Category: Strong Edition Sculptor: ATTM Official price: 8925 ¥ Preorder date: Apr-10 Release date: Aug-10 Height: 20 (cm) Weight: 1550 (g) Box size: 29.0 x 29.0 x 28.0 (cm)

Name: Armored Franky P.O.P Sailing Again Maximum Character: Franky Category: Neo DX Sculptor: ATTM Official price: 15750 ¥ Preorder date: Feb-13 Release date: Aug-13 Reeditions: Dec-13 Height: 25 (cm) Weight: 2874 (g) Box size: 40.0 x 27.0 x 35.0 (cm) Bonus: La fecha de release inicialmente era 07/2013. Se retrasó a mitad de 08/2013. El 14 de febrero de 2013 se realizaron sorteos para poder reservar más unidades de la figura a través de la web de Bandai Premium.

Name: Franky P.O.P CBR3 Character: Franky Category: CB R Sculptor: MDM Official price: 2750 ¥ Preorder date: Mar-15 Release date: Aug-15 Height: 12.5 (cm) Weight: 140 (g) Box size: 16.2 x 13.0 x 7.2 (cm)
